content: परिमोक्षः {@--1@} Removing, relieving; प्रायो विषाणपरिमोक्षलघूत्तमांगान्खड्गांश्चकार नृपतिर्निशितैः क्षुरप्रैः <ls>R. 9. 62</ls> ‘removing the horns’, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} breaking them down. {@--2@} Liberation, setting free, deliverance. {@--3@} Emptying, evacuation. {@--4@} Escape. {@--5@} Final beatitude (निर्वाण).
